metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16410 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Suricata 4.1.4. By sending multiple fragmented IPv4 packets, the function Defrag4Reassemble in defrag.c tries to access a memory region that is not allocated, because of a lack of header_len checking.

criterions.comment: suricata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
